seasons.name: The Secret of the Ghost Ball
seasons.overview: Ha-ri and Doo-ri move into an apartment with ghosts. They start seeing ghosts after taking Shinbi’s taffy. Shinbi was actually a ghost! Shinbi, Ha-ri and Doo-ri team up and start exorcising ghosts.

seasons.name: The Birth of the Ghost Ball X Part 1
seasons.overview: Ghosts come and try to trap Shinbi and Ha-ri’s crew in darkness. The legendary exorcist Leon appears and helps them overcome this crisis! Will they defeat the Black Magician and save their building?

seasons.name: The Second Story of Ghost Ball X
Ghost Ball Double X - 6 Prophecies
seasons.overview: Ha-ri is a kind-hearted girl who can talk to ghosts and help them ascend. Ha-ri and her friends head to the Haunted House with endless ghost stories and look for the source. Will they find the truth?

seasons.name: Ghost Ball Double X - Suspicious Request
Ghost Ball Z - Dark Exorcist
seasons.overview: A bear that appeared in the middle of the city is kidnapping people's pets. Siblings Hari and Duri and their friends work with Gangrim, who is trying to regain his memories and strong power. The identity of the mysterious exorcist group is revealed, and Hari works with her friends to stop them.

episodes.name: The Dreadful Descent of the Drowned Ghosts!
The Unbreakable Curse of the Girl's Hair!
The Terrifying Temptation of the Shadow Ghost
The Sinister Strike of the Spider Ghost!
The Nightmare of the No-Face Ghost
The Mystery of the Marionette Queen
The Weird Tale of the Wicked Doll Ghost!
The Hair-Raising Tale of the Homunculus!
The Frightening Fable of the Flower of Death!
The Spine-Chilling Story of the Skeleton Ghost!
The Horrifying Game of Hide and Seek
The Rise of the Underground Nation
The Wrath of the White-WInged Wraith
